name: Vert Pisse
description:
Game made for a homework based on the theme "MASSACRE". Requested by Patrice Cervellin. Made by Laurent Bui - Lethan, @lethanov
Vehicle Models created by Eracoon, @eracoon
Vehicles Assets : http://opengameart.org/content/vehicl...
Rigged Car : http://opengameart.org/content/rigged...
Music : Merry Go - Kevin MacLeod - incompetech.com Sounds : Handmade & Freesound & universalsounbank.com

Controls

- [Z][Q][S][D] (Press Shift + Alt to switch AZERTY/QWERTY): Car Control, AfterTouch
- Arrow Keys or Numpad [8][4][5][6] : Camera Control
- [Space] Key (Repeat). When available : Maintenir la charge du crashbreaker.
Crashbreaker :
Crashbreaker's gauge is loading for each vehicle crashed. Once fully loaded, you have to shortly hold the crashbreaker charge. Then your weapon (the car lulz) explodes.

Principe de l'Aftertouch :
AfterTouch allows you to move your car slightly after a Crashbreaker.
